Package CustomEvents

Class DeathEvent

java.lang.Object
Event.GenericEvent
CustomEvents.DeathEvent
public class DeathEvent extends GenericEvent
Represents an event where an individual in the population dies. This event will remove the individual from the population. The `DeathEvent` class extends the `GenericEvent` class and implements the functionality for handling the death of an individual in the population.
Since:
1.0

  • Field Details

    • remove_events

      private final Predicate<GenericEvent> remove_events
      A predicate used to filter and remove events related to the individual who is dying. This predicate checks if the event's individual ID matches the ID of this death event.

  • Constructor Details

    • DeathEvent

      Constructor for DeathEvent.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the individual that will die.
      mu - The parameter influencing the handling time of the event.

    • handle

      public Pair<PopulationInterface,EventContainer> handle(PopulationInterface population, EventContainer pec)
      Handles the death event by removing the individual from the population. Updates the event counter.
      Specified by:
      handle in class GenericEvent
      Parameters:
      population - The population interface affected by the event.
      pec - The pending event container.
      Returns:
      A pair containing the updated population interface and the pending event container.
